item.title: Scar - Faster reaction time? Less lag?
item.dc:creator: @413X 413X
item.description:
@413X wrote:

Thanks for the reply

That wait(20) is only waiting before the keyup function, but the game registers it as soon as the key goes down, so that won’t really make it any faster (where it matters at least). I want it to get to the keydown faster. After that, I couldn’t care less

Read full topic

item.source: Scar - Faster reaction time? Less lag?

item.title: Scar - Faster reaction time? Less lag?
item.dc:creator: @413X 413X
item.description:
@413X wrote:

As some of you MAY know, if you play neopets, I created a Splat-A-Sloth script a long time ago, and back then it was able to max out the score, and obtain a gold trophy almost every time. Something’s changed since then, and now my script (see below) will hit around 460 points (out of a maximum 500) every single time. 460 is the maximum that it hits once I reduce the wait function to nothing, so it can’t possibly be the wait function (I think… unless there’s a secret negative wait function :P).

For those unfamiliar with the game that would like to help, it’s basically a reflex game. You see the green thing fly out of a tube, and hit spacebar. This script sees it WAY faster than my hands and eyes can react to it, however it ALWAYS maxes out at 460. If there’s any way I can make SCAR send the space bar keystroke faster, or just process the entire script faster, it would be GREATLY appreciated. THANKS Here’s the script

///////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Splat-A-Slot // // By: Kyrndao and 413X // // // // 1. Open game in 800 by 600 resolution // // 2. Specify game client // // 3. Run the script and with it OWN // // // ///////////////////////////////////////////////////// program SplatASloth; var x,y:integer; begin clickmouse(318, 328, true); wait(6200); repeat wait(1); until(findcolortolerance(x,y,39168,162,41,238,55,35)); wait(0); // Change if the paper hits too early. keydown(32); wait(20); keyup(32); writeln(' Owned!') end.

Reason for Edit: Adding Code Tags

Read full topic
item.source: Scar - Faster reaction time? Less lag?
